mapper.select: SELECT T.VDAY AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'DAY' AS WD FROM insight_sendimentary_amount T WHERE T.VDAY >= (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(VDAY),'YYYYMMDD')-INTERVAL'15 DAY','YYYYMMDD') FROM insight_sendimentary_amount) AND T.VDAY <= (SELECT MAX(VDAY) FROM insight_sendimentary_amount) GROUP BY T.VDAY ORDER BY T.VDAY

SELECT SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') AS WEEK_DATE, ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000,2) AS FVALUE, 'WEEK' AS WD FROM insight_sendimentary_amount T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') >= NOW() - INTERVAL '12 week' AND TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') < NOW() group by SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') ORDER BY SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW');

SELECT SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) AS DATE,ROUND(SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000,2) AS FVALUE,'MONTH' AS WD FROM insight_sendimentary_amount T WHERE SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) >= TO_CHAR(NOW() - INTERVAL'12 MONTH','YYYYMM') AND SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6)
